Package MCO2

Class VMReg

java.lang.Object
MCO2.VMReg
Direct Known Subclasses:
VMSpecial
public class VMReg extends Object
This class is responsible for most of the main functions of the vending machine.

      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the vending machine
      slotCount - is the index to access a specific slot
      slotItemLimit - is how much items can there be in the slot
